action_list.description: System action for installing an application

attrs.script:
echo "Bootstrapping: @@{NginxService.name}@@ with IP Address: @@{NginxService.address}@@"

cd ~/chef-repo/
knife bootstrap "@@{NginxService.address}@@" --ssh-user @@{nutanix.username}@@ --ssh-password '@@{nutanix.secret}@@' --sudo --use-sudo-password --node-name "@@{NginxService.name}@@" --run-list '@@{chefRole}@@'

echo "Bootrap of @@{NginxService.name}@@ Complete."
